scripts.build: npm run less && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:ts: npm run ts && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: mkdirp app/dist && browserify app/src/main.js -d -t stringify -o app/dist/app.js -v
scripts.deploy: npm run clean:dist && npm run build -- -- -- -p [minifyify --no-map]
scripts.watch: concurrent -r "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:html" "npm run watch:less"
scripts.watch:less: nodemon -q -w app -e less --exec npm run less
scripts.watch:html: nodemon -q -w app -e html --exec npm run bundle
scripts.watch:ts: nodemon -q -w app -e ts --exec npm run build:ts
